it.apice.sapere.node.networking.manager
Interface NetworkManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
NetworkManagerImpl
public interface NetworkManager

Basic interface that models a service capable of handling relocation of LSAs from an LSA-space to another.

Author:
Paolo Contessi

           Retrieves the number of registered neighbours.

Method Detail

diffuse

void diffuse(Object to,
             NodeMessage msg)

Sends a message to destination, in order to diffuse an LSA.

Parameters:
to - Id of the node to which deliver the message (friendly name, neighbour LSA-id)
msg - The message

register

boolean register(String id,
                 InetSocketAddress addr)
                 throws SAPEREException

Registers a new destination.

Parameters:
id - Identifier of the destination
addr - Address (IP:Port) of the destination
Returns:
False if this registration has overridden a previous one, True otherwise
Throws:
SAPEREException - Cannot inject information

loadTable

void loadTable(File config)

Loads all destinations from a configuration (properties) file.

Parameters:
config - Configuration file

countNeighbours

Retrieves the number of registered neighbours.

Returns:
Number of neighbours
